Find New York State Services

Find services that can help

Answer a few quick questions, and we'll help you explore services that may make a difference.

We won't store or share the info you provide. See our Privacy Policy for more information.

Here's how it works:

  1. Answer the next few questions as best as you can. This isn't an application, so it's okay if you have to guess.
  2. View the services that match your answers.
  3. Select the services you'd like to learn more about (you'll be able to print or share the list).
